rules.natural: If bar X has a license, then bar X operates legally.
Whenever bar X has a major violation, bar X does not have a minor violation.
In the event that bar X provides compliant alcohol service, bar X does not violate a condition.
If bar X has proper documentation, then bar X provides compliant alcohol service.
Should bar X have valid permits, bar X has proper documentation.
Either bar X is under emergency closure, or if it is not the case that not having a license implies not serving alcohol, then bar X has conditional approval.
Whenever bar X undergoes a routine check, a follow-up visit occurs for bar X.
Bar X undergoes a routine check or bar X undergoes a complaint investigation.
Provided that bar X undergoes a complaint investigation, bar X is not under emergency closure.
In the event that bar X undergoes a follow-up visit, bar X is not under emergency closure.
Whenever bar X undergoes a senior inspector review, bar X receives compliance certification.
Either bar X undergoes a senior inspector review or bar X undergoes a junior inspector review.
If bar X undergoes a junior inspector review, then provided that bar X does not operate legally, bar X does not operate illegally.
In the event that bar X undergoes a final assessment, if bar X does not operate legally, then bar X does not operate illegally.
Should bar X receive compliance certification, bar X undergoes a final assessment.
Either bar X violates a condition or if bar X does not have a license, then bar X does not serve alcohol.
If bar X passes inspection, then bar X meets the alcohol standard.
In the event that bar X passes inspection, bar X has valid permits.
Bar X passes inspection or bar X fails inspection.
If bar X fails inspection, then bar X does not violate a condition.
Provided that inspector report A is issued for bar X, then if bar X does not operate legally, bar X does not operate illegally.
Either inspector report A is issued for bar X or inspector report B is issued for bar X.
Whenever inspector report B is issued for bar X, then should bar X not operate legally, bar X does not operate illegally.
If it is not the case that meeting the alcohol standard implies not violating a condition, then bar X has an ambiguous status.
In the event that it is not the case that passing inspection implies not violating a condition, bar X has a contradictory finding.
Should it not be true that passing inspection implies not violating a condition, then bar X does not have a contradictory finding.
If it is not the case that not having a license and not serving alcohol implies a special exemption, then bar X has a minor violation.
Provided that it is not the case that not having a license and not serving alcohol implies a special exemption, bar X has a major violation.
Should bar X not have a license, bar X serves alcohol.
Provided that bar X does not operate legally, bar X operates illegally.

Bar X does not have conditional approval.

(A1 → G).natural: If bar X has a license, then bar X operates legally.

(A14 → ¬A13).natural: Whenever bar X has a major violation, bar X does not have a minor violation.

(A20 → A22).natural: Whenever bar X undergoes a routine check, a follow-up visit occurs for bar X.

(A23 → (¬G → ¬A7)).natural: If bar X undergoes a senior inspector review, then whenever bar X does not operate legally, it is not the case that bar X operates illegally.

(A23 → A26).natural: Whenever bar X undergoes a senior inspector review, bar X receives compliance certification.

(A23 ∨ A24).natural: Either bar X undergoes a senior inspector review or bar X undergoes a junior inspector review.

(A24 → (¬G → ¬A7)).natural: If bar X undergoes a junior inspector review, then provided that bar X does not operate legally, bar X does not operate illegally.

(A25 → (¬G → ¬A7)).natural: In the event that bar X undergoes a final assessment, if bar X does not operate legally, then bar X does not operate illegally.

(A26 → A25).natural: Should bar X receive compliance certification, bar X undergoes a final assessment.
